description: Non-material amendment of Planning permission ref: P2023/3111/FUL dated 25.03.2024 which granted consent for 'Proposed erection of a new two storey (including basement level) 1no. x 1 bedroom, 2-person dwelling to replace existing rear garage and store, remodelling of existing building, mansard roof extension and two storey rear outrigger extension to provide 1x no.1 bedroom, 2-person and 1x no. 2 bedroom 4-person flat and associated works'. Amendments proposed to revise layout of ground floor level to increase shop floorspace, repositioning of WC and storage area, omission of rear yard area, retention of existing structure and amendments to door positionings
decision_conditions:
NEWLY APPROVED PLANS:

Proposed Ground Floor Plan A.01.6, 
Proposed Ground Floor Plan A.01.11, 
Proposed Side Elevation A.04.5

PLANS WITHSTANDING PLANNING PERMISSION P2023/3111/FUL:

A.00.2, A.01.5A, A.01.7A, A.01.8A, A.01.9A, A.01.10A, A.03.2A, A.03.3A, A.04.3, A.04.4, A.04.6, A.05.3, Addendum to Daylight and Sunlight Assessment (20th December 2023) and associated Plot Drawings by Herrington Consulting Limited, Design and Access Statement by Brass Architecture Rev 2, Planning Statement, Fire Safety Strategy, Structural Method Statement by TZG Partnership Engineering Consultants Rev 01 (11.10.2023), Sustainable Design and Construction Statement by NRG Consulting (February 2024).
